title: Meet Steve Borthwick - the mastermind behind England's all-conquering lineouts
text:
If there is a paradox in England’s coaching staff it is Steve Borthwick.

The public image of England’s outstanding forwards coach is of a softly-spoken Cumbrian, who would seemingly rather stick pins in his eyes than attract attention when performing his media duties. It was a similar theme when he was appointed captain of England by Martin Johnson in 2008, leading the side in 21 of his 57 caps.

And yet if you speak to anyone who played with or has been coached by the 40 year-old the contrast could not be more stark. If it hard to think of a coach with a more muted profile, bar maybe Mark McCall, the director of rugby at Borthwick’s...
description: If there is a paradox in England’s coaching staff it is Steve Borthwick.
